c74object.name: grainflow.waveform~
c74object.digest: Visualize Grainflow granulation on a waveform display
c74object.description: Visualize Grainflow granulation on a waveform display

method.name: set
method.digest: Choose a named buffer~ from which to read
method.description: Choose a named buffer~ from which to read.

method.name: grainWindow
method.digest: sets the size of the grain dots
method.description: sets the size of the grain dots

method.name: grainPosition
method.digest: sets the positions of the grain dots
method.description: sets the positions of the grain dots

method.name: grainState
method.digest: sets if the grain dots should draw at all
method.description: sets if the grain dots should draw at all

method.name: grainAmp
method.digest: sets the vertical position of the grain dots
method.description: sets the vertical position of the grain dots

attribute.name: chan
attribute.digest: The channel that the waveform will draw
attribute.description: The channel that the waveform will draw. Grains are also filtered by channel. 0 will draw the first channel and all grains

attribute.name: dotColor
attribute.digest: changes the primary grain display color
attribute.description: changes the primary grain display color

attribute.name: dotColorSecondary
attribute.digest: changes the secondary grain display color
attribute.description: changes the secondary grain display color

attribute.name: mode
attribute.digest: The interaction mode for the waveform
attribute.description: The interaction mode for the waveform. Scrub -> click and drag to change selected position. Selection -> click and drag to select a range. Loop -> click and drag to move a selection, hold option/alt to change the selection size

attribute.name: selectColor
attribute.digest: changes color of the selection range
attribute.description: changes color of the selection range

attribute.name: selection
attribute.digest: The selected range of the waveform display
attribute.description: The selected range of the waveform display

attribute.name: showTriangles
attribute.digest: shows triangles pointing at the selection position
attribute.description: shows triangles pointing at the selection position

attribute.name: trackerColor
attribute.digest: changes color of the position tracker
attribute.description: changes color of the position tracker

attribute.name: trackerWidth
attribute.digest: How thick the position tracker is
attribute.description: How thick the position tracker is

attribute.name: vZoom
attribute.digest: Increases the Y scale of the waveform
attribute.description: Increases the Y scale of the waveform

attribute.name: waveformColor
attribute.digest: Changes the color of the waveform
attribute.description: Changes the color of the waveform
